Reviews.Content: Location. Location. Location This Hotel is located a couple of 200 meters from Center Gai and 300 meters fra Haitcko crossing where you also find Shibuya station. Shibuya is a very Lively neigbourhood with many shops, bars and fine dining.It's a 10 minutes walk to Yoyogi park and Harajuko.I think you get more value for money if you for instance stay in Akasaka (3 stops from Shibuya on the Ginza line) where it's a bit more quiet than Shibuya. But if you want to stay where the fun is stay in Shibuya.The hotel is average. Nice little building and reception. The rooms are small compared to hotelrooms in US, but i think this is normal for Tokyo. Very small bathroom. The recepionist spoke a little english just enough to get the information we needed. The rooms are a little worn down, but overall it was a nice experience. But the best part of this hotel is the loaction.
Reviews.Author: rudilund

Reviews.Content: Decent Business Hotel, Great Location       Actually, a nice view!
Reviews.Author: NYCJohnny1

Reviews.Content: very nice hotel Me and my husband went Honeymoon in Japan-Toyko.Recommendation Tobu Hotel from Lonely Planet Travels guide book.Both of us just love it when we saw the hotel,can't really explain why?In future if we go japan again,we'll stay in this lovely hotel again.p/s:- Front dest staff was friendly,always smile,and gave us a warm feeling during our stay.regards,cons and chris
Reviews.Author: Concheetoon
